archimate:DataObject.name: Transaction Type
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A classification of a Transaction. Authorized Transaction Types are specified by the Sovrin Technical Governance Board in the Steward Technical Policies (see Appendix A of the Sovrin Governance Framework Master Document). For example supported Transaction Types for the Sovrin Main Ledger include: NYM (for writing a DID), ATTRIB (for writing an Attribute), CLAIM_DEF (for writing a Credential Definition), SCHEMA (for writing a Schema), REVOC_REG_DEF (for writing a Revocation Registry Definition), and REVOC_REG_ENTRY (for writing a Revocation Registry Entry).
